content.raw: How about we leave it out for now, and ticket an issue about joint visualization for the SDF parser? I think there are several things to be considered before implementing this, for example, when using the SDF parser to view a preview of a model before it is inserted on the server, it's best for performance that we don't generate joints. The same goes for the other visualizations you're adding. Do you think it's ok to keep this pull request about loading files?
content.html: How about we leave it out for now, and ticket an issue about joint visualization for the SDF parser? I think there are several things to be considered before implementing this, for example, when using the SDF parser to view a preview of a model before it is inserted on the server, it's best for performance that we don't generate joints. The same goes for the other visualizations you're adding. Do you think it's ok to keep this pull request about loading files?
